ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Saraswati Mahila shilpkala Parshikshan Samiti, having its registered office at Village: Kurauli, Post: Gandhi Ashram, Barabanki is a voluntary Social organization registered under Indian Societies Registration Act 21, 1860 having its Registration No. 90/91-92. As mentioned above that although society was registered on 06/04/1991 but it has been carrying out its activities for the last several years in rural and urban areas of the District Barabanki. Society was established with the basic aim of providing social services to all community. These social services includes training Programmes, Educational Programmes, Income generating Programmes, Environmental Programmes, Rural sanitation Programme, Awareness Programmes, Cultural Activities etc. In order to make youth and women self depended society has been carried out different type of Training Programmes. These training Programmes include Tailoring & Knitting Programme, Handicraft Training Programmes, Computer Training Programme, etc. In addition to these society has been carried out several awareness Camps, health checkup camps, environment protection Programme, AIDS protection Programmes, etc. All these Programmes have been carried out by society through its own resources but even then every activity was completed in a successful manner. It is also important to mention here that society has been carrying out Job for formation of Self Help Groups (SHGs) in rural areas of the district Barabanki from its own resources. Society has very deeply observed the pitiable position of these artisans who are very skilled in CHIKAN CRAFT & PATCH WORK job but in absence of proper guidance & direction they are still depend on the mediators. Several years have been passed but no improvements have come in the life of these artisans. They couldnt become self dependent. Now it is hoped that this new Scheme will bring a new era in the life of these artisans and they will be able to earn very handsome amount involving any mediator. The new scheme launched by the Ministry of Textile, Office of the Development Commissioner (Handicraft), New Delhi, under its scheme Baba saheb Ambedkar Hastshilp Vikas Yojna is a very noble and exploring the actual artisan, who find themselves in pitiable position in absence of proper guidance and financial support. Under this scheme every sort of assistance guidance shall be provided to artisans to make them Self Entrepreneur.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Our mission aims at supporting and facilitating children, adolescent girls,women and community in such a way that they are able to integrate their potential, wisdom and resources to command development process on their own. We facilitate by evolving and implementing strategies ,approaches and platforms for participatory planning, social and behaviour change communication , community ownership, capacity building and mainstreaming with public systems. While implementing integrated and sector specific strategies, Sarathi functions as resource organisation also to build capacities of civil society organisations, government functionaries, community based organisations, volunteers and social networks for wider outreach in regards to our vision and mission. This has provided us with a strong professional base to scale and build partnerships with a range of institutions including UNICEF, CRS, Dasra , CARE India, NABARD, Action Aid, Family Health International, UPSACS Global Giving and various corporate organisations, goverment, universities, global networks donors.
